name: MIS Incidents Performance Hub Report
description: INC0023 v1.0 This report provides a breakdown plus totals of Incidents which have occured over a date range selected at runtime. The report includes information such as Ethnic Code and Age, along with participants details.

dataset.name: Incidents
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, INITCAP(AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_DESC) AS INCIDENT_TYPE, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TIME, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TIME, 12, 2)) AS INCIDENT_HOUR, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TIME, 15, 2)) AS INCIDENT_MINUTES, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, COUNT(DISTINCT (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)) AS COUNT_OF_OFFENDERS, AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE.PARTICIPATION_ROLE_DESCRIPTION, FLOOR((MONTHS_BETWEEN((TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), (CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END))) / 12) AS OFFENDER_AGE, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE END AS ETHNIC_CODE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT AT_INCIDENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_STATUS AT_INCIDENT_STATUS, BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_INCIDENT_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_TYPE AT_INCIDENT_TYPE WHERE (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK = AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION_ROLE_SK = AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE.INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION_ROLE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_INCIDENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_DATE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.INCIDENT_CASE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IS NULL OR AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK = AT_DOB.DATE_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ETHNICITY_CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_SK = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (INITCAP(AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_DESC) IN ('Assault (From April 2017)', 'Assaults', 'Assaults (From April 2017)') AND ((AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE) BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-07-2018 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('11-09-2018 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')) AND AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, INITCAP(AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_DESC), AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TIME, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TIME, 12, 2)), TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TIME, 15, 2)), AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE.PARTICIPATION_ROLE_DESCRIPTION, FLOOR((MONTHS_BETWEEN((TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), (CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END))) / 12), CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE END), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, INCIDENT_TYPE, INCIDENT_TIME, INCIDENT_HOUR, INCIDENT_MINUTES, INCIDENT_CASE_ID, SURNAME, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, COUNT_OF_OFFENDERS, PARTICIPATION_ROLE_DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER_AGE, ETHNIC_CODE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)
